attributes.action: Let us ban Bullfighting around the world!
attributes.additional_details:
Bull fighting belongs to the era when Christians were thrown to the lions for fun.
To say that it is an 'honourable tradition' is a paltry and feeble excuse. This blood-thirsty, institutionalized torture of innocent animals for entertainment should have no place in the pride of a nation. It brings shame on all those who watch it, allow it, profit from it and promote it.

Every animal deserves to be treated with respect, human or not.
